Renewal
Step 1.
Contact your Cisco reseller to purchase a registration key (RK) to renew your ProtectLink license.
Step 2.
Register your registration key (RK) at https://olr.trendmicro.com/redirect/cisco_renew.aspx
by logging in with your existing ID and password and obtain an activation code (AC).
Step 3.
Use your activation code (AC) to enable ProtectLink at: https://olr.trendmicro.com/registration/us/en-us/cisco_activation.aspx
